text: The Beach of La Concha (, ) is a beach in the Bay of La Concha (Shell Bay, in Spanish, named for its shape) in San SebastiÃ¡n, Basque Country. It is one of the most famous urban beaches in Europe. The beach is sandy. The sand doesn't go very deep. The tide going in and out changes the amount of area that can be used. By the beach there is a long walkway. The beach is known as an urban beach in wide use. > "The Concha stretches out for a kilometre and a half, with the accent on > elegance and delightful city views." ==References== ==Other websites== *- PLAYA DE LA CONCHA Category:Beaches of Europe Category:Gipuzkoa Category:12 Treasures of Spain
title: Beach of La Concha
